verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> Tempting Him <S%G3985><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> To Shew <S%G1925><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Evening <S%G3798><s%> Having Come <S%G1096><s%> , Ye Say, <S%G3004><s%> , Fine Weather; <S%G2105><s%> <S%G4449><s%> For Is Red <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> At Morning, <S%G4404><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> , A Storm; <S%G5494><s%> <S%G4449><s%> For Is Red <S%G1063><s%> Lowering <S%G4768><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%> , Hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Ye Know How <S%G1097><s%> , To Discern, <S%G1252><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Times <S%G2540><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Cannot! <S%G1410><s%>

A Generation <S%G1074><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Adulterous <S%G3428><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Seeks, <S%G1934><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To It, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> Of Jonah <S%G2495><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet. <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leaving <S%G2641><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Went Away. <S%G565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side <S%G4008><s%> They Forgot <S%G1950><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> To Take. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beware <S%G4337><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Reasoned <S%G1260><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> We Took. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> And Having Known This <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> , To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Reason Ye <S%G1260><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> O Ye Of Little Faith, <S%G3640><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Ye Took? <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G3768><s%> Do Ye Not Perceive, <S%G3539><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Remember <S%G3421><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Five Thousand, <S%G4000><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Hand Baskets <S%G2894><s%> Ye Took Up? <S%G2983><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Four Thousand, <S%G5070><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Baskets <S%G4711><s%> Ye Took Up? <S%G2983><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Perceive Ye Not <S%G3539><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> I Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> To Beware <S%G4337><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees? <S%G4523><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> They Understood <S%G4920><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Said Not <S%G2036><s%> To Beware <S%G4337><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Of Bread, <S%G740><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> And Having Come <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parts <S%G3313><s%> Of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philippi <S%G5376><s%> He Questioned <S%G2065><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Pronounce <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man? <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Baptist; <S%G910><s%> <S%G243><s%> And Others <S%G1161><s%> , Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> <S%G2087><s%> And Others <S%G1161><s%> , Jeremiah, <S%G2408><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Ye Pronounce <S%G3004><s%> To Be? <S%G1511><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living. <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Art Thou, <S%G1488><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> <S%G920><s%> Bar - Jonah, <S%G920><s%> <S%G2495><s%> , For <S%G3754><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Revealed It Not <S%G601><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G2504><s%> And I Also <S%G1161><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Rock <S%G4073><s%> I Will Build <S%G3618><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gates <S%G4439><s%> Of Hades <S%G86><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Prevail Against <S%G2729><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Keys <S%G2807><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens : <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> Thou Mayest Bind <S%G1210><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Bound <S%G1210><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens; <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> Thou Mayest Loose <S%G3089><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Loosed <S%G3089><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Charged He <S%G1291><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> They Should Say <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

From <S%G575><s%> That Time <S%G5119><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To Shew <S%G1166><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Is Necessary For <S%G1163><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Go Away <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> To Suffer <S%G3958><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Killed, <S%G615><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> To Be Raised. <S%G1453><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken To Him <S%G4355><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, God Be <S%G3004><s%> Favourable <S%G2436><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Lord : <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> This. <S%G5124><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Having Turned <S%G4762><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Get <S%G5217><s%> Behind <S%G3694><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> Satan : <S%G4567><s%> An Offence <S%G4625><s%> , To Me <S%G3450><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1488><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thy Thoughts Are Not Of <S%G5426><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> Desires <S%G2309><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> To Come, <S%G2064><s%> Let Him Deny <S%G533><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Take Up <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> His Cross, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> To Save, <S%G4982><s%> Shall Lose <S%G622><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Lose <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> Shall Find <S%G2147><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For What <S%G1063><s%> Is Profited <S%G5623><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> <S%G2770><s%> <S%G3588><s%> He Gain, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5590><s%> And His Soul <S%G846><s%> Lose? <S%G2210><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Will Give <S%G1325><s%> A Man As <S%G444><s%> An Exchange For <S%G465><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Soul? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3195><s%> For Is About <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of His <S%G846><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angels; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> He Will Render <S%G591><s%> To Each <S%G1538><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4234><s%> His Doing. <S%G846><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> , Standing <S%G2476><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Taste <S%G1089><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> They Have Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> His Kingdom. <S%G846><s%>
